  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120081</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120081</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tretji Newtonov zakon, stične sile</string>
            <string language="en">Newton's Third Law, Contact Forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drittes Gesetz Des Newtons, Kontakt-Kräfte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loi de Newton La Troisième, Forces de Contact</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei Do Newton Terceira, Forças Do Contato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge Del Newton Terza, Forze Del Contatto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτος νόμος Newton, δυνάμεις επαφών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercera Ley Del Neutonio, Fuerzas Del Contacto</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dve kladi stojita druga poleg druge, na prvo delujejo z neko silo. Ugotovi s kolikšno silo prva deluje na drugo in s kolikšno druga na prvo.</string>
            <string language="en">Dwa masses are placed next to each other and constant force is acting on the first mass. Determine the contact forces acting between the masses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tretji newtonov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">newton's third law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stične sile</string>
            <string language="en">contact forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">newtonovi zakoni</string>
            <string language="en">newton's laws</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dwa Massen werden nahe bei einander plaziert und 
konstante Kraft fungiert auf der ersten Masse. Stellen Sie die 
Kontaktkräfte fest, die zwischen den Massen fungieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les masses de Dwa sont placées à côté de l'un
l'autre et la force constante agit sur la première masse. 
Déterminez les forces de contact agissant entre les masses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As massas de Dwa são colocadas ao lado de se e a
força constante está agindo na primeira massa. Determine as 
forças do contato que agem entre as massas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le masse di Dwa sono disposte vicino a vicenda e 
la forza costante sta comportandosi sulla prima massa. Determini
le forze del contatto che si comportano fra le masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μάζες Dwa τοποθετούνται η μια δίπλα στην άλλη 
και η σταθερή δύναμη ενεργεί στην πρώτη μάζα. Καθορίστε 
τις δυνάμεις επαφών ενεργώντας μεταξύ των μαζών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las masas de Dwa se ponen al lado de uno a y la 
fuerza constante está actuando en la primera masa. Determine 
las fuerzas del contacto que actúan entre las masas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drittes Gesetz des Newtons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontaktkräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetze des Newtons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi de newton la troisième</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forces de contact</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les lois de newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do newton terceira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forças do contato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leis do newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del Newton terza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forze del contatto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">leggi del Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίτος νόμος Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δυνάμεις επαφών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμοι Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tercera ley del neutonio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerzas del contacto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">leyes del neutonio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
